title: range over slice of int64 looses type
body:
by **darek.krk**: 
What does 'go version' print?
go version go1.3.1 linux/amd64

What steps reproduce the problem?
http://play.golang.org/p/_c-Kb21zQb

What happened?

Range over a slice of int64 (eg: []int64{1,2,3}) produces a variable of type int

What should have happened instead?
range should produce variable of type int64

Please provide any additional information below.

os Ubuntu 14.04 64-bit, fully up-to-date
